cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: delay
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: delay while not making use of time scale (which also delays decay after peak)

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: fast onset
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments: transients are considered as really 'low' thing and thus doesn't require attentional bottleneck

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: onset energy > offset energy
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
- due to inaccurate perception, it is possible that either only onset or offset detects change, which can lead to inaccurate detection of mismatch

- if offset has more energy: fine, as mismatch won't fire anyway

- if onset has more energt: the node fires and inhibit mismatch field

cedar.dynamics.Preshape.name: stabilized match
cedar.dynamics.Preshape.comments: - use to average out flickering match detection

cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.name: stabilized transient onset
cedar.dynamics.NeuralField.comments:
[function]
stabilize transients to not get 'flickering'

[regime] 
multi-peak tracking perception

ui.text: needed trntiate color change from loc change
